name: The Wiz
description:
Race against the eternal clock as you aid The Wiz in his journey to the top of the mountain.

The Wiz is constantly running out of power so make sure to utilize your environment to replenish as needed.

As your power runs out, as does the opacity of your character, as he/she fades from existence.

Can you help our wizard friend complete his ascent? Probably not, but download to find out!

Also check out the jam site:

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/39/the-wiz
